title: What can be the speed of Jio 5g? - Technology updater - Quora

response.answer_text: Jio 5G speed will be in the order of 1 Gbps (similar to the 5G speeds offered by other service providers across the globe).
response.upvotes: Submission accepted by A. Rama Raju

response.answer_text: Jio subscribers are much larger so speed will be around 100mbps
